title: Helson matrices induced by measures
authors: Sameer Chavan, Chaman Kumar Sahu, and Kalyan B. Sinha
abstract:
We introduce a family of Helson matrices induced by the Laplace transform of
a class of regular positive Borel measures $\mu,$ not necessarily finite, on
$(0, \infty)$ and discuss their boundedness, Schatten-class properties and
scattering theory. We also briefly discuss the class of Helson matrices induced
by signed measures.
